message.body: are you guys still venturing this way tonight?
I'm not sure. I just texted Fiona to see if was gonna cancel. I will let you know what I hear.
Yeah let me know! Our soil line froze so we are currently defrosting crap. Litterally.
OMG!!!! That sucks!!! I didn't even know that could happen.
I WISH I didnâ€™t know it could happen
Fiona just sent a message saying she is postponing until Wednesday. Good luck with your pipes!! I hope you don't have to poop anytime soon.
Ha! We are making some Progress. Weds I teach til 10 I'll have to catch her this week before she goes! No poops!
